ONLY A LITTLE WHILE.\97It will only be a little while before Jesus will come to save His children and to give them the finishing touch of immortality. \93This corruptible shall have put on incorruption, and this mortal shall have put on immortality.\94 The graves will be opened, and the dead will come forth victorious, crying, \93O death, where is thy sting? O grave, where is thy victory?\94 Our 
163
loved ones who sleep in Jesus will come forth clothed with immortality.
